fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - On odd nights, choose a target, and heal all players visiting your target. On even nights, choose a target, and heal all players your target visits. Once per game, you may select yourself, healing everyone in the game.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value: - You will know if you *and* how many people you heal with your abilities.
